text: Zhongren a! You yige piyu, nimen qingting ba! Nimen she zhenzhu er qidao de (ouxiang) sui quncequnli, jue buneng chuangzao yi zhi cangying; ruguo cangying cong tamen de shenshang duoqu yidian dongxi, tamen ye buneng ba na dian dongxi qiang huilai. Qidao zhe he bei qidao zhe, dou shi nuoruo de!'
